message.subject: Pipeline investments
message.content:
M1.1. Does TPC or NNG have any investments in any non-pipeline assets (financial or otherwise)?
[Request-Information: do TPC or NNG have any investments in any non-pipeline assets]
Flink1.1
M1.2. I was not aware of any but we need to disclose these.
[Inform: Kevin was not aware of any, but they need to be disclosed]

message.subject: Pipeline investments
message.content:
M2.1. both have investments in financial instruments; but they are in support of the base pipeline business
M2.2. both have a huge stake in enron via ene notes!!
[Inform: both of them have investments in financial instruments, and have a large stake in Enron via ENE notes]
Blink1.1
